name: Real Car Parking Game 2017
description:
If you aren’t a big fan of car parking games, then you must give this car parking simulator game a try. It is quite hard parking (but not unplayable), tough challenge and extremely addictive. The master parking 3d levels are well designed in order to give you one challenge at a time, and one you are a pro like Dr parking, then all the challenges are coming your way, one after the other from all different directions in this Real car parking mania of 2017. Cars are racing on the street to get to the lot, and find best spot out all the hard parking slots and win the ultimate adventure race challenge.

As this car game is quite hard to maneuver, that’s why, you are given all the different camera views, ranging from still in all four direction and the bird eye view. You also have access to the rotating camera angles, which help you pass you car freely in these narrow twist and turns, while you are facing traffic from the opposite end, and you don’t want to bang against them, so stay focused in this car parking simulator the best of all car parking games on the store.

There are rotating hurdles going up and down, or moving around in circle quite fast, or they are sliding sideways, so watch out for all those while you are on your parking mania missions and having loads of fun. In this car parking 3d game you are also driving on the roads to head to your desired slots, but make sure to follow all the road roles, as the rule of thumb is “ The road is there to share”.

You might be asked to park in reverse or angular, so keep the angles intact in this game, by far the best game of the store. The immense challenges and difficulty of the game will keep you busy and involved for longer period of time, and you might feel like a real parking frenzy for the days and months to come.
Playing these games also enhances your driving skills, even in real life, because the way you reverse the cars in these bends and hurdles, keeping an eye on the wheel and also checking your speed is all part of real life scenarios which you will be facing in this car parking frenzy game, and come out as guru with the title Dr Parking.

Features:
• Splendid 3D multi story car parks, with complete details.
• Multiple 3d models to choose from, ranging from vintage cars to top of the range sports cars.
• Rewind option available, in case you don’t want to go all the way back in this Real parking mania game.
• Steering, button and tilt controls available, choose the controls whichever suits you best, by the way controls are all very smooth.
• Different camera angles available, still and rotating.
• Interesting real simulator with addictive game play.
• Right and left wheel driving, both options available in this car simulator.
